meanings.definition: A software program used for editing and manipulating digital images.
meanings.sent1: I used photoshop to edit my vacation pictures.
meanings.sent2: She is skilled at using photoshop to enhance photos.
meanings.sent3: The photoshop made the picture look like a painting!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity with photoshop turned the image into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The photoshop tool allows for precise adjustments to images.

meanings.definition: To alter or manipulate a photograph using software such as Adobe Photoshop.
meanings.sent1: He decided to photoshop the background of the photo.
meanings.sent2: They photoshop their pictures before posting them online.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally photoshopped my friend's head onto a cat's body!
meanings.sent4: She photoshopped her way into the group photo.
meanings.sent5: Photoshopping the image made it look completely different.
